channel.title: Blue Screen Issues
channel.description: Hi there Black Mesa community, I've been having some issues with Black Mesa. Every so often, the game freezes for a few seconds, the sounds that are playing at the time stutter and repeat, the whole thing freezes and my computer shuts down with a blue screen error. This is very annoying. Please help me!

item.title: Blue Screen Issues
item.dc:creator: PlausibleSarge
item.description:
I used to get the exact same error with some games almost instantly, and in other games after a while

I fixed it by installing the latest graphics card drivers, and resetting the clock speed on my video card (it came factory overclocked)
